bibl.title: The Peristyle of House H1 in the Ancient Town at Marina el-Alamein.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The architecture and proportions of the two-storeyed peristyle porticoes. - The place of the peristyle in house architecture. - Parallel designs from other regions.

bibl.title: Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday.

bibl.seg: Rafał Czerner, The Peristyle of House H1 in the Ancient Town at Marina el-Alamein.
Henryk Meyza & Iwona Zych (edd.), Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 129-146, 6 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Introduction. - The architecture and proportions of the two-storeyed peristyle porticoes. - The place of the peristyle in house architecture. - Parallel designs from other regions.
